text: Kanye West is in a ‘ better place ’ one year after his infamous breakdown — he ’ s excited for the new baby and is feeling secure in his marriage with Kim Kardashian. So will he return to the public eye soon? Kanye West, 39, is doing well these days, as a source close to the rapper tells HollywoodLife. com exclusively. “ He ’ s feeling very positive and upbeat. Kanye ’ s done a lot of soul searching over the past year, he ’ s worked through a lot of issues, and he ’ s in a better place than he has been for ages, ” the insider reveals. Glad to hear it!
